title: The Unaccounted Return
outcome: When the BCI's failures create chaos, hundreds of citizens who previously disappeared from watchlists reappear. They leverage system blind spots, organizing covert networks and exploiting gaps in oversight, destabilizing city routines and amplifying tension within the Council. The city is quietly reshaped from within as the 'invisible' assert power.

events.description: IT teams notice the sudden and unexplained return of citizens previously purged from BCI watchlists. Their digital profiles are scrambled and appear system-resistant.
Groups of untracked citizens move through the city, bypassing BCI-linked checkpoints and coordinating manual delivery of food, medicine, and information to those cut off by system failures.
The Council receives intelligence about covert assemblies organized by 'invisible' citizens. Unexplained disruptions target high-score citizens and Council-favored services.
Social order destabilizes as basic city services fail to distinguish between compliant and vanished citizens. Public trust in the BCI collapses, and open calls for a new system emerge.
